original_text: And purify all your raiment, and all that is made of skins, and all work of goats' hair, and all things made of wood.
korean_text: 모든 의복과 가죽으로 만든 모든 것과 염소털로 만든 모든 것과 나무로 만든 모든 것을 다 깨끗하게 할지니라

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 모든 옷을 정결하게 하라

sentences.original_text: and all that is made of skins
and all work of goats' hair
and all things made of wood
